job.title: Cleared Software Engineer (Full Stack with any languages, Big Data Environment. Junior candidates can apply)

job.description: This position is funded and vacant and the customer is actively hiring for this role strongWill consider Junior candidatesbrbrstrongstrongPosition is with the VA McLean Customer and requires an active TSSCI with Full Scope Poly clearancebrbrstrongThe Software Engineer will design develop code test and debug complex new software products or make significantbrbrenhancements to existing software The ideal candidate is a handson platform builder with experience inbrbrdeveloping scalable data platforms with experience in business intelligence analytics data science and data productsbrbrThey must have firsthand technical expertise in a variety of configuration management and big databrbrtechnologies and the proven ability to fashion robust scalable solutions that can manage large data sets They must bebrbrat ease working in an agile environment with little supervision This person should embody a passion for continuousbrbrimprovement and innovationbrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli Demonstrated experience with software development in any languagelili Bachelors Degree in Computer Science Electrical or Computer Engineering or a related technical discipline or thebrliulequivalent combination of education technical training or workmilitary experiencebrbrustrongBenefitsbrbrstronguLeading Path is an awardwinning Information Technology and Management Consulting firm focused on providing solutions in process technology and operations to our government and Fortune 500 clients We offer a professional and supportive familyfriendly work environment with a strong worklife balance Leading Path provides a comprehensive and competitive benefits package 401K tuition reimbursement and opportunities for professional growth and advancement
